## ĐẠO HÀM

### Định nghĩa

$$f'({x_0}) = \mathop {\lim }\limits_{\Delta x \to 0} {{\Delta y} \over {\Delta x}}$$ 

hoặc 

$$f'({x_0}) = \mathop {\lim }\limits_{\Delta x \to 0} {{f(x) - f({x_0})} \over {x - {x_0}}}$$

### Công thức

$$\eqalign{
  & (u + v)' = u' + v'  \cr 
  & (u \times v)' = u'v + v'u  \cr 
  & {\left( {{u \over v}} \right)^\prime } = {{u'v - v'u} \over {{v^2}}} \cr} $$


$$\eqalign{
  & {{y'}_x} = {{y'}_u} \times {{u'}_x}  \cr 
  & (k \times u)' = k \times u'  \cr 
  & {\left( {{k \over u}} \right)^\prime } =  - {{k \times u'} \over {{u^2}}} \cr} $$
